an6.117:2.1: 12. Sāmaññavagga
an6.117:4.1: “Cha, bhikkhave, dhamme appahāya abhabbo kāye kāyānupassī viharituṃ.
an6.117:4.3: Kammārāmataṃ, bhassārāmataṃ, niddārāmataṃ, saṅgaṇikārāmataṃ, indriyesu aguttadvārataṃ, bhojane amattaññutaṃ.
an6.117:4.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme appahāya abhabbo kāye kāyānupassī viharituṃ.
an6.117:5.1: Cha, bhikkhave, dhamme pahāya bhabbo kāye kāyānupassī viharituṃ.
an6.117:5.3: Kammārāmataṃ, bhassārāmataṃ, niddārāmataṃ, saṅgaṇikārāmataṃ, indriyesu aguttadvārataṃ, bhojane amattaññutaṃ.
an6.117:5.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme pahāya bhabbo kāye kāyānupassī viharitun”ti.
